document_data.mainbody:
uri was an adventurer and wererat active in Waterdeep during the late 15 century DR.
Suri was a girl with brown hair who wore a silver sun-shaped pendant.
Circa the , Suri and her sister Perdita adventured through a secret crypt hidden beneath the City of the Dead. Misled by fake treasure maps distributed by Bregan Daerthe, the young sisters reached the lair of Artor Morlin, a powerful vampire. There, Perdita lost her life and became a ghost, while Suri fought a wererat and subsequently contracted lycanthropy.
